overallPrizes.title: 1st Prize – 2022/23 Fantasy Premier League Champion
overallPrizes.description: 7-night break in the UK including VIP hospitality at two 2023/24 Premier League matches
rewards: A week’s worth of experiences at popular tourist attractions courtesy of Visit Britain
FPL goody bag consisting of a rucksack, t-shirt, mug, water bottle, stress ball, pen, pad and key ring

eligibility: * To be eligible to win a weekly prize, you must have joined the game before the start of the season or a minimum of two clear Gameweeks before the one in which you are top of the weekly leaderboard. Players who have played a chip (including Bench Boost, Free Hit Triple Captain or Wildcard) will not be eligible to win a weekly prize for the Gameweek that such a chip has been used.
